options: To measure the error of the model
questions.answer: To measure the error of the model

questions.question: Which of the following is a popular deep learning framework?
What is overfitting in machine learning?
options: When a model performs well on training data but poorly on test data
When a model performs well on test data but poorly on training data
When a model performs well on both training and test data
When a model performs poorly on both training and test data
questions.answer: When a model performs well on training data but poorly on test data

questions.question: Which of the following is a technique to prevent overfitting?
What is the difference between classification and regression?
options: Classification predicts categories, regression predicts continuous values
Classification predicts continuous values, regression predicts categories
Classification is supervised, regression is unsupervised
Classification is unsupervised, regression is supervised
questions.answer: Classification predicts categories, regression predicts continuous values

questions.question: What does CNN stand for in the context of deep learning?

What is the purpose of a validation set in machine learning?
Which algorithm is used for classification problems?
What is reinforcement learning?
options: A type of learning where an agent learns by interacting with its environment
A type of learning where the model is trained with labeled data
A type of learning where the model is trained with unlabeled data
A type of learning where the model is reinforced with additional data
questions.answer: A type of learning where an agent learns by interacting with its environment

questions.question: Which of the following is a commonly used optimization algorithm in machine learning?
What is a hyperparameter in machine learning?
options: A parameter whose value is set before the learning process begins
A parameter that is learned from the data
A parameter that is used to initialize the model
A parameter that is used to preprocess the data
questions.answer: A parameter whose value is set before the learning process begins

questions.question: Which technique is used to reduce the dimensionality of data?
What is the purpose of a learning rate in machine learning?
options: To control the step size during the optimization process
To determine the number of iterations
questions.answer: To control the step size during the optimization process
